Posts.Content: i am 23 yrs old i am due to go for a mammogram in 2 wks which seems like forever to me right now. i know it sounds silly for someone my ge to be worried but well i found a lump that is not painful does not move freely around and has not reduced in size. nothing showed up in an ultra sound and kind of freeaked me out that the doc said she was worried that it was still there. do not drink very often, good diet, no breast cancer history in family, healty fit (around 58kg) i have look up benign and such but most site i have looked up dont explain in english i understand or anything that seems like my condition. can any give me info on anything regarding this or a good website to look up thank you
Posts.Title: 23yrs old and worried
